name: False Idol
description: In memories, you reside. As each nights fade away, so do you. In time, I worshipped. Then, it was but a mere concept of love that bounds me to it, to you. In the end, I did nothing but worshipped a false idol, you. In me, you were the light. In truth, It was all but mere fright. I do not know how to end this terror. I imagine my head on your chest when I look in the mirror. In this horror, in this eternal night, show the the light.
